name: stuff-quiz
description: Calls a webhook with latest stuff quiz scraped from the quizzes page

scripts.zip-and-copy-to-update-bucket: npm run zip-code && npm run update-deployment-bucket
scripts.update-function-code: npm run zip-code && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ScrapeQuiz --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip --publish

author: Michael Lowe
